SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated

Class LightDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightTableRelated.LightDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightDeck extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class represents the decks in the game seen by the view. In the buffer the cards are fully visible, but for the top card of the deck only the back is visible.
See Also:

      Parameters:
